title: Amazon launches AI-powered shopping assistant
summary: Amazon introduces Rufus, a generative AI chatbot to help users discover products and make purchase decisions.

title: Stripe adds embedded finance tools for platforms
summary: Stripe now enables platforms to offer banking features like lending and card issuing directly within their apps.

title: Shopify unveils new B2B commerce features
summary: Shopify expands its B2B capabilities with custom catalogs, payment terms, and company profiles for wholesale buyers.
